original_text: Adonijah and all the guests who were with him heard it as they finished feasting. And when Joab heard the sound of the trumpet, he said, “What does this uproar in the city mean?”
korean_text: 아도니야와 그와 함께 한 손님들이 먹기를 마칠 때에 다 들은지라 요압이 뿔나팔 소리를 듣고 이르되 어찌하여 성읍 중에서 소리가 요란하냐

sentences.original_text: Adonijah and all the guests who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 아도니야와 그와 함께 있던 모든 손님들이

sentences.original_text: And when Joab heard the sound of the trumpet
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요압이 나팔 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: “What does this uproar in the city mean?”
